code:
def min_platforms(arrival, departure):
    arrival.sort()
    departure.sort()
    
    n = len(arrival)
    platforms = 1
    result = 1
    i = 1
    j = 0
    
    while i < n and j < n:
        if arrival[i] <= departure[j]:
            platforms += 1
            i += 1
        elif arrival[i] > departure[j]:
            platforms -= 1
            j += 1
        
        if platforms > result:
            result = platforms
    
    return result

arrival = [900, 940, 950, 1100, 1500, 1800]
departure = [910, 1200, 1120, 1130, 1900, 2000]

print(min_platforms(arrival, departure))
prompt: Minimum number of platforms required problemini yaz.
